title: Колишня
overview: The nationally known coach Regina Lavrentyeva returns with her wards from the junior championship. Two thoughts do not give her peace - at the championship, one of her two daughters (Lana) got a leg injury, and her beloved husband and father, the famous businessman Yurii Lavrentiev, do not meet them yet. However, Regina leaves the airport with her husband's brother, Vlad, who has long been involved in all the finances of Regina's gymnastics school. On the way, they discuss the upcoming celebration of Regina and Yuri's silver wedding and the school's financial situation. Regina calls her stepson Leonid - Yuri's son from her first marriage, with whom she has a very warm relationship (and who now lives and works in America). Later, she tries to call her and Yury's son Mykhailo, who is studying in London, but to no avail. At this time, Yurii is with his young lover Tonya...
